subject: Greeting from USA I.R.S,
body:
Greeting from USA I.R.S,
I am Mr. Daniel Werfel , The Commissioner Of Internal Revenue Service,
We write to inform you that your Consignment box containing sum of
$12,000,000.00 USD Twelve Million United State Dollars is still at the
Customs warehouse waiting for resolutions of the $100 so that Chief
Justice shall signed those documents so that customs will safe and
free the Diplomatic Agent to delivery of your consignment to you at
your door step address.
The lottery won by your e-mail address via online active email address
selected from sponsor of Coca Cola Company award. We have arrested
Mrs.Kathleen since last week for trying to claim your Consignment box,
according to Mrs.Kathleen,she said that she is your younger sister and
you are at hospital so she want to claim the $12,000,000.00 USD to
enable her pay your hospital bill, But we later got an information
from Diplomatic Agent that you inform him that you did not know the
said Mrs.Kathleen and she is not your sister.
We have got Mrs.Kathleen arrested and you did not want to make any
effort how your consignment will delivered to your house, Now
Mrs.Kathleen is still claiming her right that we got her arrested for
nothing that you are the person who sent her to claim the
$12,000,000.00 USD, So you are advised to comply immediately to avoid
releasing the consignment to the wrong person/hands. follow the
instruction immediately for your own good and future
Right now what is holding your consignment is $100 
and every other
documents guiding your delivery is well updated.Furthermore 
you are
advice to be very  fast
 as the Agent Mr.Frank Wilfred has no time to
waste due to his flight ticket, Be informed that the Diplomatic Agent
is still at your Airport waiting to dispatch the consignment to your
designated,
You are advised to send the $100 immediately so that I will meet the
Chief Justice to signed those documents and FAX to the Customs in your
Airport to release the $12,000,000.00 USD to the Diplomatic Agent to
complete this delivery to you, This is huge amount of money that you
can invest to ease the economic crunch and to be profitable and help
others in need as a measure to ease the present economic hardship.
You are advised to buy Steam Wallet Gift Card or Amazon card of $100
USD scratch it and send the photo to me for your own good,
The consignments were declared as personal effects and classified
documents while in actual fact contain raw cash. US currency notes in
$200 USD denominations carefully packed and stashed in trunk box.
Approximately, $12,000,000.00 USD. The electronic scanner revealed it
when the package was scanned in the airport.
Finally we say congratulation to you because you are the real
ownership of the consignment box according to the information we got
here in our data base system. Right now what is holding your
consignments box is only $100 USD, You are advised to buy Amazon card
or Steam wallet Card of 100 USD.
Treat with urgency,
Get back to us right now.
Thanks and Remain blessed in the Lord.
Sincerely.
Mr. Daniel Werfel
Commissioner of Internal
Revenue Service,
Address,{internalrevenueservice8007@gmail.com}

subject: Re: Greeting from USA I.R.S,
body:
Hello Mr. Daniel Werfel,

Thank you for reaching out to me and informing me about this situation. I must say, it's quite a surprise to hear about the lottery win and the box containing such a large sum of money.

I'm curious though, how did my email address get selected for this award? And could you please provide more details about the person who was arrested claiming to be my sister? I don't recall sending anyone to claim any money on my behalf.

Also, could you explain why I need to purchase a Steam Wallet Gift Card or Amazon card? How does that relate to getting the box delivered to me?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Michael
